item.title: GitHub Activity: 2025-12-30
item.description:
From 2025-12-30 to 2025-12-31, elizaos/eliza had 3 new PRs (1 merged), 2 new issues, and 8 active contributors.

Code: +159/-60 lines across 4 files (15 commits)

Notable PRs:

  • #6300 feat: unified hooks with multi-transport support (HTTP/SSE/WebSocket) (@standujar)
  • #6296 fix(core): log streaming LLM calls to database (@standujar)
  • #6297 fix: saftey → safety (@efeecllk)

Top Contributors: standujar, odilitime, efeecllk, greptile-apps, ChristopherTrimboli

item.title: GitHub Activity: 2025-12-29
item.description:
From 2025-12-29 to 2025-12-30, elizaos/eliza had 4 new PRs (4 merged), 4 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

Code: +1,142/-201 lines across 9 files (20 commits)

Notable PRs:

  • #6099 feat(server): Add x402 payment middleware to Jobs API (@wtfsayo)
  • #6209 [DRAFT] feat(core): Implement parallel action execution in processActions (@wtfsayo)
  • #6285 fix(server): standardize message server route naming (@standujar)
  • #6293 fix: Enable hot reload for backend development (@wtfsayo)
  • #6290 docs(plugin-dummy-services): add comprehensive README (@wtfsayo)

Top Contributors: wtfsayo, standujar, tdnupe3, greptile-apps, borisudovicic
